characters.name: Iruma Suzuki
characters.description:
__Rank:__ ~!As of now in the Manga, Iruma achieved Rank [5] *He*.!~
__Familiars:__ ~!His very first and only familiar is a demon named [Callego Naberius](https://anilist.co/character/135021/Callego--Naberius), whom he managed to summon in the form of a flying owl in episode 2 of the series.!~

A 14-year-old human boy whose parents sold him to a demon named [Sullivan](https://anilist.co/character/135023), who subsequently transports him to the Demon World and adopts him as his grandson. He starts his new life by being enrolled into Babyls Demon School, where he constantly has to hide the fact that he is a human in order to avoid being eaten. However, after quickly making friends with fellow classmates [Asmodeus](https://anilist.co/character/135022/Alice-Asmodeus) and [Clara](https://anilist.co/character/135019/Clara-Valac), he eventually grows accustomed to his new lifestyle through both his numerous adventures and encounters with other demons.

characters.name: Alice Asmodeus
alt_names: アスモデウス・アリス
characters.description:
__Height:__178 cm
__Rank:__ ~!As of now in the Manga, Asmodeus has achieved Rank [5] *He*.!~
__Familiars:__ ~!Gorgon Snake: a dragon snake that can manipulate fire.!~
__Inherited Magic:__ ~!Fire Magic: Alice has exceptional and effective control of fire magic. Furthermore, he may utilize it both offensively (through fireballs or a sword made of flames) and defensively (by the ability to make fire barriers). He also gained the ability to produce blue flames, which are thought to be more powerful than his usual flames.!~

Alice Asmodeus is the top student of his class at Babyls. His rank and power exceeds those of most other freshman. For a very short time, he was antagonistic, but later became [Iruma's](https://anilist.co/character/135018)'s first and closest friend.

characters.name: Clara Valac
characters.description:
__Height:__ 153 cm
__Rank:__ ~!As of now in the Manga, Clara has achieved rank [4] *Daleth*.!~
__Familiars:__ ~!Falfal: a green-looking creature that is very eccentric, much like its owner.!~
__Inherited Magic:__ ~!Dimensional pockets: Clara can flawlessly duplicate or conjure any thing or object she has previously seen and pluck it out of one of her skirt pockets.!~

Clara is one of the stranger students at the school, acting very much like an excited child. She has abundant energy that most students can't keep up with. Other students find her weird and hard to deal with, but are drawn to her because her inherited power is so convenient. Since she had no friends, she would give students snacks and drinks as "payment" for playing with her. She is the second friend [Iruma](https://anilist.co/character/135018) made at Babyls.

characters.name: Ameri Azazel
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190cm
__Rank:__ ~!As of now in the Manga, Ameri has achieved rank [6] *Vav*.!~ 
__Relatives:__ Merize (Mother), Azazel Henri (Father)
__Familiars:__ ~!It is yet unknown.!~ 
__Inherited Magic:__ ~!Romanticist: Ameri can pull out her utmost power by trusting in her own strength, making it the Azazel Family's mightiest buff magic as it releases all of their power without limit. Because it is the greatest kind of self-hypnosis, it may be a double-edged sword that can even harm the user if they are afraid of the opponents they confront.!~

Ameri is the president of Babyls' Student Council. She is convinced humans exist, despite them only being myth in the demon world, and believes [Iruma](https://anilist.co/character/135018) to be one. Ameri hides the fact that she enjoys manga, "the forbidden books of the human world", and has Iruma read them to her in secret.

~!During the Student Council Training Arc is revealed that she is in love with Iruma!~

characters.name: Kalego Naberius
alt_names: ナベリウス・カルエゴ
characters.description:
__Rank:__ Chet (Anime & Manga)
__Height:__182 cm
__Inherited Magic:__Cerberion
__Relatives:__Naberius Narnia (Older Brother)
__Occupation:__Teacher

Iruma's Familiar/Contracted Demon

The homeroom teacher of the Misfit Class, and one of the prestigious professors at Babyls Demon School. Derisive, snappy, and short-tempered, he strongly dislikes demons who are boisterous, brash, and inconsiderate of others, believing them to be troublemakers. As such, he is generally pessimistic when dealing with his students. 

Due to how the familiar summoning spell works with humans, Kalego unwillingly becomes [Iruma Suzuki](https://anilist.co/character/135018)'s familiar for a year. When summoned, Kalego appears as a fluffy white creature resembling a small crow, complete with black bat-like wings, black horns, and his distinctive front hair curl.

characters.name: Sullivan
characters.description: Sullivan is the adoptive grandfather of [Iruma](https://anilist.co/character/135018) and the principal of Babyls. He is one of the Three Heroes, the most powerful and influential demons in society, and is a possible candidate for the new Demon King. He's a Tet (9) Rank.

characters.name: Opera
characters.description:
__Occupation:__~!Security Devil, Babyls Teacher!~

Sullivan's servant who does the chores around the house.

Opera was Kalego's upperclassman when they were both students at Babyls.

Opera has a serious, down to earth personality. They often act as a voice of reason for Lord Sullivan, but are usually ignored. They are mostly reserved with their opinion, but will voice the occasional concern or cynical remark, and will sometimes dispense helpful advice.

Their interactions with Kalego reveal that they have a somewhat more mischievous and sadistic side not normally shown in their professional behavior, which was especially prominent when they were students at Babyls.

characters.name: Sabro Sabnock
characters.description:
__Rank:__ _Bet_ (Anime), _Daleth_ (Manga)
__Inherited Magic:__ Weapon Creation
__Battlers:__ Demon King Battler
__Height:__ 220 cm

Sabro is the second son of a prestigious family. He dreams of becoming the next Demon King and sees Iruma as a rival after the Rank placement exams. Sabro is a Bet (2) Rank and his familiar is a Kelpie.

characters.name: Jazz Andro
characters.description:
__Inherited Magic:__ Pit (Furtive Glance)
__Familiar:__ Split Wolf
__Height:__174 cm

Jazz is a Gimel Rank and has the pickpocketing ability.

~!He is promoted to rank Daleth after the music festival.!~

characters.name: Lead Shax
characters.description:
__Height:__154 cm
__Rank:__ ~!As of now in the Manga, Lead has achieved rank [4] *Daleth*.!~ 
__Familiars:__ ~!Clever Monkey.!~ 
__Inherited Magic:__ ~!Controller: Lead is capable of stealing one of the target's five senses and adopting it as his own.!~

A cheerful guy who is often seen playing some kind of game. He himself admits that he is addicted to gambling as well as games, and even chooses a battler that allows him to indulge in his hobbies

characters.name: Elizabetta Ix
alt_names: イクス・エリサベッタ
characters.description:
__Species:__ Demon
__Rank:__ Aleph (Anime), Daleth (Manga)
__Inherited Magic:__ Favorability
__Familiar:__Floral Papillion
__Height:__ 176 cm

Elizabetta is a demon and student at Babyls. She is a member of the Misfits Class.

Elizabetta can be described as calm and collected. She often likes to take the back seat in the midst of the various shenanigans of the Misfits Class, rarely instigating anything herself. However, she appears to greatly enjoy their antics, participating when her assistance is requested.

characters.name: Picero Agares
characters.description:
__Current Rank:__ _Aleph_ [1] (Anime), _Daleth_ [4] (Manga)
__Inherited Magic:__ My Area

A student at Babyls who is lazy and is always sleeping/napping on a cloud. He wears an eyemask.

Unexpectedly, he's extremely good-looking (ikemen) without his eyemask.

characters.name: Kamui Caim
characters.description:
__Species:__ Demon
__Current Rank:__ _Aleph_ (Anime), _Daleth_ (Manga)
__Inherited Magic:__ Translation
__Affiliation:__ Babyls Demon School (Misfit Class)
__Height:__ 75 cm

A perverted owl-like demon who is ironically a gentleman. He was placed in the Abnormal class due to his non-stop sexual harassment of other female students. His rank is Aleph.

characters.name: Goemon Garp
characters.description:
__Rank:__ _Beth_ (Anime), _Daleth_ (Manga)
__Inherited Magic:__ Wind Blade
__Height:__ 173 cm

A student at Babyls Demon School and a member of the Misfit Class who ends his sentences with -de gozaru. He is willing to help others without anything in return and he is very persistent in most situations.

characters.name: Schneider Allocer
alt_names: アロケル・シュナイダー
characters.description:
__Familiar:__ Smart Hawk

An Aleph rank who is actually very smart despite his goofy looks. He often speaks in proverbs, and apparently knows a large amount of trivia.
